20101206224703.000|20101206224705.000|CCO|THE BLAZE OF THE BURNING BUSH.

20101206224707.000|20101206224709.000|CCO|MOUNT SINAI, THE BUSH THAT 
20101206224709.000|20101206224711.000|CCO|BURNED WITH FIRE, BUT THE FIRE
20101206224711.000|20101206224714.333|CCO|DID NOT CONSUME.

20101206224717.667|20101206224721.000|CCO|FIRE, THE SAME FIRE THAT LED 
20101206224721.000|20101206224722.667|CCO|ISRAELITES OUT OF EGYPT.

20101206224724.333|20101206224726.000|CCO|FIRE IN THE SEAL.

20101206224729.333|20101206224731.000|CCO|IT'S THE FIRE OF GOD, THE FIRE
20101206224731.000|20101206224732.667|CCO|OF TRUTH.
20101206224732.667|20101206224734.333|CCO|NOT A LOT OF AMERICANS KNOW

20101206224741.000|20101206224744.333|CCO|FRANKLIN BUT HE CHOSE THE

20101206224751.000|20101206224753.500|CCO|AND THEY HAD GOD HOLD THE
